WE ARE GETTING MARRIED
Cassie & Jaemon
05.14.2016

&
THE BRIDE

CASSIE RAMKISSOON

Cassie is a one of a kind girl! She has one of the biggest hearts ever and would bend over backwards to help someone! She is everything a guy could ever want! She brightens my day up with her corny jokes that make even the worst of days a great one!

Over these past couple of years we have truly learned what it means to make a relationship click and really fight for it! Through every trial we triumphed over it with God's help and putting him first!

I have the best woman alive! She is the best hair stylist and makeup artist around, and the love of my life and I can't wait to spend the rest of my life with her! She has the hardest job ever putting up with me! But I must say she does it pretty well! I have always dreamed of having a woman who loves me for me and encourages and supports me through anything and everything! She will forever be my numero uno!

  • I'm *CRAZY in love with Her! I'm always *AMAZED by Her! I'm tired of be *SEPARATED from Her *SASSY self!
  • I'm *IMPRESSED by how far we have come!
  • and I am *EXCITED to do life with her, and to see where life takes us!

Sometimes the heart sees what is invisible to the eye.
THE GROOM

JAEMON BEVERLEY

Jaemon is honestly the chocolate chips to my mint ice cream. Over the passed few years, We have learned 3 things- mostly the hard way;

  • 1)Distance never gets easier but love is more powerful than any amount of miles.
  • 2)Compromise!
  • 3)Communication is key!

I'm so blessed to have someone who; always opens and closes the car door for me, would rather hear my voice then text me, always says yes, holds my bags for me, takes me looking for water falls, goes along with my crazy ideas, prays for me, holds my hand, loves me, supports me and encourages me to do whatever I want.

I found the one who puts me in my place and doesn't put up with my nonsense. He is hard working. He has a heart of gold. He is obsessed with paintball. He doesn't meet a stranger, he's that guy that genuinely cares about everyone. He always gives and doesn't care about receiving. He is also slightly obsessed with sour patch kids, dogs, Cracker Barrel and apple pie.

If Jaemon was a super hero, he'd be batman. He may not have super powers but he is a United States Marine and thats basically the same thing! Like batman, Jaemon is willing to help and protect anyone no matter the consequences, he's super intelligent, he's incredibly strong and can definitely kick butt! Jaemon may not have a sense of fashion but I don't have a sense of direction, so together we can make it!

Where there is love there is life.
